word:
Chap. 59 - Diary Entry

                                                            Ms 25, 1890 

            Importance of Accepting and Applying God's Word; 
                Christ's Mission, and His Method of Teaching 


     Battle Creek, Michigan, January 7, 1890: I arise at half past three to build my fire and make my supplications to God for His blessing. I have comfort and peace and hope through Jesus Christ.
